translation: ここまでだ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ここまでだ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: 今、なんと？{#Name="オクタ"}
source: 今、なんと？{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: お前達はここまででいい{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: お前達はここまででいい{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ここから先は私だけで行く{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ここから先は私だけで行く{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: そんな……我々の事をお気遣いでしたら{#Name="デカート"}
source: そんな……我々の事をお気遣いでしたら{#Name="デカート"}

translation: 違う{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 違う{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: お前達使徒は、ウタウタイの力が無ければ人の形を維持出来ない{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: お前達使徒は、ウタウタイの力が無ければ人の形を維持出来ない{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: いずれ、消えてしまうんだ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: いずれ、消えてしまうんだ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: だからその前に{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: だからその前に{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: 元の姿に戻れ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 元の姿に戻れ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: さよなら{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: さよなら{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: 楽しかったよ……{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 楽しかったよ……{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Head for the Cathedral.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Head for the Cathedral.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Imps!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Imps!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Gray Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Gray Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: I give up... She's too strong for us... We'll never beat her...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: I give up... She's too strong for us... We'll never beat her...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Don't you dare wimp out on us!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Don't you dare wimp out on us!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: It's time for a full-scale attack!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: It's time for a full-scale attack!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: It's finally come to this...{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: It's finally come to this...{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: How could she have advanced this far?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: How could she have advanced this far?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: She's an Intoner! Intoners are the real deal, man!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: She's an Intoner! Intoners are the real deal, man!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Retreat is not an option! Why the hell do you think we're here!?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Retreat is not an option! Why the hell do you think we're here!?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: He's right! We fight to the end! For Lady One's sake!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: He's right! We fight to the end! For Lady One's sake!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: We must become as a shield for our Lady!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: We must become as a shield for our Lady!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: It's the only way to repay our savior!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: It's the only way to repay our savior!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: それが、我々を救ってくださったワン様への…恩返しだ{#Name="兵士Ａ"}
source: それが、我々を救ってくださったワン様への…恩返しだ{#Name="兵士Ａ"}

translation: Zero! You abominable demon!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Zero! You abominable demon!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: まさに、忌まわしき災い！{#Name="兵士Ｂ"}
source: まさに、忌まわしき災い！{#Name="兵士Ｂ"}

translation: Chin up, people!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Chin up, people!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Chin up? We're gonna DIE!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Chin up? We're gonna DIE!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Then face your death with a stout heart!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Then face your death with a stout heart!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Stay back. I'll be your shield!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Stay back. I'll be your shield!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: A-Are you sure?{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: A-Are you sure?{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Veteran soldiers should be beacons of hope for the young. Now get behind me!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Veteran soldiers should be beacons of hope for the young. Now get behind me!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: And please...save Lady One for me. For us all.{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: And please...save Lady One for me. For us all.{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: This is it, men! Give it your all!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: This is it, men! Give it your all!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Captain! Our numbers are—{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Captain! Our numbers are—{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Our numbers are just fine! Now fiiight!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Our numbers are just fine! Now fiiight!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: 了解！{#Name="兵士Ｃ"}
source: 了解！{#Name="兵士Ｃ"}

translation: ヤツら全員狂ってます！{#Name="兵士Ｇ"}
source: ヤツら全員狂ってます！{#Name="兵士Ｇ"}

translation: 戦場とは、そういうヤツらと向き合う場所さ{#Name="兵士Ｅ"}
source: 戦場とは、そういうヤツらと向き合う場所さ{#Name="兵士Ｅ"}

translation: No... Noooooo!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: No... Noooooo!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Keep moving!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Keep moving!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Rear support!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Rear support!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Got it! Requesting backup now!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Got it! Requesting backup now!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: D-Damn! Don't fall back! Don't fall...back...{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: D-Damn! Don't fall back! Don't fall...back...{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Captain!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Captain!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Keep moving!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Keep moving!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Sir! We have nowhere left to go!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Sir! We have nowhere left to go!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Are we even hurting them!?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Are we even hurting them!?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: We must have done SOME damage by now!{LF}...Right!?{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: We must have done SOME damage by now!{LF}...Right!?{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: We should have known mere humans{LF}couldn't combat an Intoner...{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: We should have known mere humans{LF}couldn't combat an Intoner...{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Well, we've made our bed now, so keep fighting!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Well, we've made our bed now, so keep fighting!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Come on, move! Goddammit, you stupid legs, MOVE!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Come on, move! Goddammit, you stupid legs, MOVE!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: This is such a drag! Can we just kill everyone{LF}and get the hell outta here already?{#Name="Dito"}
source: This is such a drag! Can we just kill everyone{LF}and get the hell outta here already?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I'm sure you can tell by my face,{LF}but I'm what you might call...delicate.{#Name="Cent"}
source: I'm sure you can tell by my face,{LF}but I'm what you might call...delicate.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Well, it has been a long battle.{LF}Are you starting to slow down?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Well, it has been a long battle.{LF}Are you starting to slow down?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Heavens no! Don't mistake this laid-back{LF}ease of mine for laziness, mmm?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Heavens no! Don't mistake this laid-back{LF}ease of mine for laziness, mmm?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: {#Name="セント"}
source: {#Name="セント"}

translation: We must keep Lady Zero safe!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: We must keep Lady Zero safe!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I'm pretty sure "Lady Zero" can{LF}watch her own ass just fine.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I'm pretty sure "Lady Zero" can{LF}watch her own ass just fine.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hell, if anything, she should be protecting US!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hell, if anything, she should be protecting US!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: どっちかっつーと、{LF}こっちがゼロに守ってもらいたいくらいだ{#Name="ディト"}
source: どっちかっつーと、{LF}こっちがゼロに守ってもらいたいくらいだ{#Name="ディト"}

translation: Don't say such things!{LF}We must give all for our Intoner!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Don't say such things!{LF}We must give all for our Intoner!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I detect the putrid breath of{LF}soldiers quaking in fear.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I detect the putrid breath of{LF}soldiers quaking in fear.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Trivia time! Did you know sixteen percent of{LF}human breath consists of harmful chemicals?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Trivia time! Did you know sixteen percent of{LF}human breath consists of harmful chemicals?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I... No, I've never heard that.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I... No, I've never heard that.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I wouldn't think so. This is my{LF}first time hearing it too.{#Name="Cent"}
source: I wouldn't think so. This is my{LF}first time hearing it too.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: How is it that I keep ending up fighting{LF}these stupid battles again?{#Name="Dito"}
source: How is it that I keep ending up fighting{LF}these stupid battles again?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Oh ho ho! It's all for Lady Zero, of course.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho ho! It's all for Lady Zero, of course.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: The simple truth is, we're all completely{LF}helpless against her charms...{#Name="Octa"}
source: The simple truth is, we're all completely{LF}helpless against her charms...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: You gotta be kiddin' me...{#Name="Dito"}
source: You gotta be kiddin' me...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: *Huff, huff...*{#Name="Zero"}
source: *Huff, huff...*{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero, are you okay? The flower's{LF}force is getting stronger!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero, are you okay? The flower's{LF}force is getting stronger!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Keep...going...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Keep...going...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: But...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Shut up and keep going no matter what!{LF}You hear me!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shut up and keep going no matter what!{LF}You hear me!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You rotten dog... I'll kill ya!{LF}And then I'll kill ya again!{#Name="Dito"}
source: You rotten dog... I'll kill ya!{LF}And then I'll kill ya again!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Despite all your anti-social bluster,{LF}Dito, I see you're still fighting hard.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Despite all your anti-social bluster,{LF}Dito, I see you're still fighting hard.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Eh, I figure I might as well help Z{LF}out as long as I'm here.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Eh, I figure I might as well help Z{LF}out as long as I'm here.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You see, Dito? The power of genuine{LF}friendship conquers all!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: You see, Dito? The power of genuine{LF}friendship conquers all!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Yeah, yeah. Don't get your panties in a{LF}bunch about it. You're creepin' me out.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah, yeah. Don't get your panties in a{LF}bunch about it. You're creepin' me out.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Goodness. Whatever are we to do now?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Goodness. Whatever are we to do now?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I shall follow Lady Zero to the ends of the earth.{#Name="Octa"}
source: I shall follow Lady Zero to the ends of the earth.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: What if you die?{#Name="Cent"}
source: What if you die?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Then I shall ascend to heaven{LF}without regrets! Oh ho ho!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Then I shall ascend to heaven{LF}without regrets! Oh ho ho!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: You may laugh at this, but I dream{LF}of one day living in peace.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: You may laugh at this, but I dream{LF}of one day living in peace.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Yet...the bitter truth does not escape me.{LF}I know in my heart that I was born for combat.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Yet...the bitter truth does not escape me.{LF}I know in my heart that I was born for combat.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I am a disciple, created only to serve an Intoner.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I am a disciple, created only to serve an Intoner.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I agree. Completely.{#Name="Octa"}
source: I agree. Completely.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Then how about you both shut up{LF}and make with the killin'!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Then how about you both shut up{LF}and make with the killin'!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You stole the words right from my beautiful mouth!{#Name="Cent"}
source: You stole the words right from my beautiful mouth!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Well, this is it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Well, this is it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's what, my lady?{#Name="Octa"}
source: It's what, my lady?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I won't be needing you anymore.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I won't be needing you anymore.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I can handle the rest by myself.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I can handle the rest by myself.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: M-My Lady, please, if you're worried about us, we—{#Name="Decadus"}
source: M-My Lady, please, if you're worried about us, we—{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: No.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's unavoidable. Disciples can't remain{LF}in human form without an Intoner's power.{#Name="Zero"}
source: It's unavoidable. Disciples can't remain{LF}in human form without an Intoner's power.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Sooner or later, you'll disappear.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Sooner or later, you'll disappear.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So before that happens...{#Name="Zero"}
source: So before that happens...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm giving you your old forms back.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm giving you your old forms back.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Goodbye.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Goodbye.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero's actually here!? But how!?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Zero's actually here!? But how!?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: All soldiers, take position!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: All soldiers, take position!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Oh ho! It seems the enemy's anxious to go out {LF}in a blaze of glory!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! It seems the enemy's anxious to go out {LF}in a blaze of glory!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Head for the Cathedral.{#Name="ディト"}
source: Head for the Cathedral.{#Name="ディト"}

translation: Contact lost with second unit!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Contact lost with second unit!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Stand strong and protect the gates! Fight!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Stand strong and protect the gates! Fight!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Aaargh! I'm hit! Someone...avenge me...{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Aaargh! I'm hit! Someone...avenge me...{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: No! Wait! Stay alive!{LF}Hey, we need a medic over here!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: No! Wait! Stay alive!{LF}Hey, we need a medic over here!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Once we clear these soldiers out,{LF}the Cathedral should be close.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Once we clear these soldiers out,{LF}the Cathedral should be close.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Hmm? Are you asking for help from little old me?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Hmm? Are you asking for help from little old me?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Well, it does make sense to use{LF}the best arrow in your quiver.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Well, it does make sense to use{LF}the best arrow in your quiver.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I knew you'd come crawling to{LF}dear old Cent eventually!{#Name="Cent"}
source: I knew you'd come crawling to{LF}dear old Cent eventually!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Octa? Can I ask you a favor?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Octa? Can I ask you a favor?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Ignoring me, eh? Such bashfulness{LF}really is unbecoming...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Ignoring me, eh? Such bashfulness{LF}really is unbecoming...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Is he dead? Hey, hey, is he dead?{LF}Whoa, look at all the blood!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Is he dead? Hey, hey, is he dead?{LF}Whoa, look at all the blood!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ha ha! Do me a favor and skip the medics,{LF}would you?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ha ha! Do me a favor and skip the medics,{LF}would you?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Great. Another freak of nature.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Great. Another freak of nature.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Flying beasts. Imps, I would imagine.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Flying beasts. Imps, I would imagine.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: They say they feast on the livers of humans.{#Name="Octa"}
source: They say they feast on the livers of humans.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: That's quite the habit they've got there.{#Name="Zero"}
source: That's quite the habit they've got there.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho! It seems the enemy's anxious{LF}to go out in a blaze of glory!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! It seems the enemy's anxious{LF}to go out in a blaze of glory!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Well then, let's not disappoint the bastards!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Well then, let's not disappoint the bastards!{#Name="Dito"}
